# File examples/text/text_box.rb, line 7
  def get_string(i, j)      
    case i
    when 0
      text = "this is left text " * 30
      text.insert(48, "\n\n")
    when 1
      text = "this is center text " * 30
      text.insert(54, "\n\n")
    when 2
      text = "this is right text " * 30
      text.insert(51, "\n\n")
    end
    
    case j
    when 0
      text.split(" ").slice(0..47).join(" ")
    when 3
      text.delete(" ")
    else
      text
    end
  end
